content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible rental price, but I am open to negotiation. Can you tell me more about the apartment and its location? This will help me determine a fair rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, the apartment is located in a central area of the city, with easy access to public transportation, shops, and restaurants. As for the rental price, I am open to negotiating, but I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand. I am willing to pay a fair rental price based on the location and the size of the apartment. Can you tell me more about the utilities and other expenses that I would need to be aware of?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Sure, the utilities and other expenses will depend on your usage. You will also be responsible for paying for your own internet and phone bills. The monthly rental payment will be around 800 Euros, but I am open to negotiating based on your needs and usage. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine
